MemoryInfobox.description: 'The Greece|Greek world was littered with caves used by bandits, outlaws, and cults to conduct meetings and hide treasure. Exploring them could yield great rewards for one brave enough to delve underground.'

General_Description: '''Cave Crusader''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Kassandra was charged to explore numerous caves throughout [[Greece]].
Section_Outcome: After exploring numerous caves all around Greece, Kassandra returned to the contact in [[Kirrha]], [[Phokis]], to receive a reward.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]] ''
